FAQs

We already have ISAs.⌄
Augment them - AI covers low/medium leads and off-hours; ISAs focus on the hottest conversations.
Will we lose the personal touch?⌄
No. AI qualifies and books; your agents do the human conversations. Voices are natural and brand-tuned.
Compliance?⌄
DNC/opt-out/cooldowns enforced with audit trail; GDPR/TCPA aligned. You control rules and scripts.
Cost justification?⌄
Calls are ~$0.07/call. One extra closing per month often pays for the platform.
What happens when I click the primary CTA?⌄
You’ll either see the live demo video with booking, or jump straight into the dashboard demo — no signup needed.
Do I need to integrate anything first?⌄
Not for the demo. In production, connect your CRM and calendars - then go live.

Pilot in 90 days. Prove the lift.

Agree success metrics - connection rate, appointments booked, show-up rate - and see the impact on your leads.
